ygData.subject: Re: Medium Bronze Plate
ygData.msgSnippet: Is the armor medium bronze plate in unrest or small? ... From: Bill Teudt [mailto:billt@ptesinc.com] Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 12:34 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
Is the armor medium bronze plate in unrest or small?

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Teudt [mailto:billt@...]
Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 12:34 PM
To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Medium Bronze Plate


From: Bill Teudt <billt@...>

The only bronze that I personally have obtained have been from undead in
Unrest. Specifically from Dry-Boned Skeletons and Barbed Skeletons.
Unfortunately, at 12th level, those beasts would probably make short work of
you. Dry boned frequently /con black or yellow to me and barbed skeletons
almost always /con red. I can solo some of the dry boned with full mana and
LOH available, but I would stand no chance against a barbed with less than a
party of 3. I started adventuring in Unrest at 15th level, fighting
beetles, tormented dead and greater skeletons. Just stick to the right side
of the house and be careful of trains when you decide to go there. I would
wait until you get your repulse undead spell though, because that's when a
Paladin's ability against undead really begins to shine.

May Tunare bless you!

Jarad
19th Circle Paladin of Tunare
Legion of Norrath
Povar



-----Original Message-----
From: Gary Long [SMTP:glong@...]
Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 10:23 AM
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Medium Bronze Plate

From: Gary Long <glong@...>

Hail Grod,

What level are the creatures who carry the small bronze? Would my
12th level
paladin have a chance against them when grouped with 3-5 characters
of 12th
level?

My thanks for any information you are willing to share,
Kaladin, the small-size armor wearing Paladin

Rodney Miller wrote:

> From: Rodney Miller <RMiller@...>
>
> I have found quite a bit of small bronze plate at Lake Rathetear.
Does
> anyone know where to find medium bronze plate? I have seen many
people
> wearing it, but noone discussing where to find it. I am more than
willing
> to travel.
>
> Let me know if you have any info.
>
> Grod
> Paladin 23rd Rank
> Innoruuk Server
>
>
